overview:
As Chief Executive Officer, Kevin Sproles drives Volusion’s overall strategic vision while overseeing all facets of the company’s operations. Kevin founded Volusion in 1999 in response to the growing need for a true all-in-one solution that made it easy for business owners to sell online

Volusion, now with more than 150 employees, is still led by Kevin Sproles. Kevin has won several business awards for his success with Volusion, including BusinessWeek’s “Best 25 Entrepreneurs Under 25” and the San Fernando Valley Business Journal’s “40 Under 40 Leadership Award.” .

external_links.title: Business Week - America's Best Young Entrepreneurs
